card_text: If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 Level 1 Winged Beast monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Lyrilusc - Cobalt Sparrow" once per turn. A WIND Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.
‚óè Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.
